data.title: ’82 just like that’ – Joke Silva celebrates Olu Jacobs on his birthday
data.meta_description: Nollywood actress, Joke Silva, has celebrated her husband, actor Olu Jacobs, who turned 82 today. Taking to her Instagram page to celebrate the legendary movie star, Silva, wished him “an amazing y…
data.text:
Nollywood actress, Joke Silva, has celebrated her husband, actor Olu Jacobs, who turned 82 today.

Taking to her Instagram page to celebrate the legendary movie star, Silva, wished him “an amazing year ahead.”

She wrote, “82 just like that… Agba ko mi nira l’agbara Jesu… Sir J of life @_olujacobs.”

In recent news reports, rumours emerged that the ailing actor has passed away.

However, his family swiftly debunked the rumours.

Joke Silva revealed a few years ago that her husband is battling dementia. Since then, Jacobs has been away from the public eye.
